Ubuntu 6.06 LTS: hi all - i am thinking of buying wireless cards / routers for my desk top and laptop - which ones would u recommend that are known to 'just work' with ubuntu pls? i have heard the wireless isn't that good on linus

hi all - i am thinking of buying wireless cards / routers for my desk top and laptop - which ones would u recommend that are known to 'just work' with ubuntu pls? i have heard the wireless isn't that good on linus
Hold up, lemme get the model number
wmp54g works great. As for the router, I like the wrt56g handles very nicely
As for notebooks, what I did was take a LiveCD into the store and test them out to see if their internal wireless card worked
And with the wireless card in the computer, make sure you learn how to use ndiswrapper. (I was using he PCI card, not the USB one)
